analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#113-114) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#211-247)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#327-349)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#420-435)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#439-456)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#520-524) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#260-278):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#275-276)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#277)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#551-566) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#563-566)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#487) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#528-531)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#520-524)
	- /unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#522-524
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#85)

Different versions of Solidity is used in /unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.13', '^0.4.6']
	- /unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#1 declares pragma solidity^0.4.6
	- /unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#621-622 declares pragma solidity^0.4.13
TokenController.proxyPayment (/unique_chucks/20/0x12157fe711f63a68a6bf623c9544a3f61c67946f.sol#34-36) should be declared external
